content: made with senso #3 wt thread and #1 steel crochet hook **this pattern will retain the shape of the piece i made when you use the normall double_crochet height with 2 double_crochet inside the box no height of stitch nor change of how many double_crochet in each box is needed to make it look like the picture** **pattern notes ** the pattern says chain 80 double_crochet in 4th st from hook there should be 77 double_crochet in first row -there are 77 double_crochet in the first row when you are done and count them but you are only making 76 double_crochet because when you chain 80 and then go into the 4 st your chain just created the first double_crochet automatically then you go on to crochet 76 more double_crochet ending with a count of 77dc it is important to count in the beginning of a filet or nothing will go right after that is why i gave the row count of the completed first row of dcs **2 page pdf file is the free ravelry download above ** original link http //geocities com/cozyhomelife/crochet/pumpkin-myfiletdesign htm archived link http //web archive org/web/20130202222618/http //geocities com/cozyhomelife/crochet/pumpkin-myfiletdesign htm
